truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is the study of the properties and behaviors of inorganic compounds."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is the study of the properties and behaviors of mythical creatures."

truth: -  "Inorganic compounds are often characterized by high melting points and electrical conductivity."
fiction: -  "Inorganic compounds are often characterized by their ability to glow in the dark and taste like chocolate."

truth: -  "Salts, such as sodium chloride, are examples of inorganic compounds."
fiction: -  "Salts, such as table sugar, are examples of inorganic compounds."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry includes the study of minerals found in the earth's crust."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry includes the study of extraterrestrial life forms found in the earth's crust."

truth: -  "Transition metals, like iron and copper, are often studied in inorganic chemistry."
fiction: -  "Transition metals, like gold and silver, are often studied in culinary arts."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is fundamental to the development of catalysts."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is fundamental to the development of time machines."

truth: -  "Inorganic compounds do not contain carbon-hydrogen bonds."
fiction: -  "Inorganic compounds do not contain any atoms."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry plays a key role in the field of materials science."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry plays a key role in the field of fashion design."

truth: -  "Inorganic compounds can be found in nature, like quartz and feldspar."
fiction: -  "Inorganic compounds can be found in nature, like unicorns and dragons."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry involves the study of all elements in the periodic table."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry involves the study of all elements in the periodic table of desserts."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is crucial in the development of new materials and processes in industry."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is crucial in the development of new dance moves and music genres."

truth: -  "Inorganic compounds often have a crystalline structure."
fiction: -  "Inorganic compounds often have a fluffy, cloud-like structure."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry includes the study of both natural and synthetic materials."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry includes the study of both natural and supernatural phenomena."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is used in the field of environmental science to understand pollution and its effects."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is used in the field of environmental science to understand the language of animals."

truth: -  "Inorganic compounds, such as metals, can conduct electricity."
fiction: -  "Inorganic compounds, such as metals, can conduct symphony orchestras."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is important in the field of medicine for drug design."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is important in the field of medicine for designing fashion-forward scrubs."

truth: -  "Inorganic compounds can be simple ions, like sodium (Na+), or complex structures, like silicates."
fiction: -  "Inorganic compounds can be simple ions, like sodium (Na+), or complex structures, like Lego buildings."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is concerned with the properties and behavior of inorganic compounds, which include minerals, metals, nonmetals, and their compounds."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is concerned with the properties and behavior of inorganic compounds, which include cereal, milk, eggs, and their compounds."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is used in the field of forensics to analyze trace evidence."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is used in the field of forensics to analyze the handwriting of suspects."

truth: -  "Inorganic compounds are often used in pigments and dyes due to their vibrant colors."
fiction: -  "Inorganic compounds are often used in pigments and dyes due to their pleasant smells."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is essential in the development of new energy sources, such as solar cells and fuel cells."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is essential in the development of new energy sources, such as unicorn power and fairy dust."

truth: -  "Inorganic compounds can be both naturally occurring substances and industrially synthesized."
fiction: -  "Inorganic compounds can be both naturally occurring substances and magically conjured."

truth: -  "Inorganic chemistry is important in the study of geochemistry and mineralogy."
fiction: -  "Inorganic chemistry is important in the study of astrology and palmistry."
